verses.roman:
deha-tyāgādi tamo-dharma--pātaka-kāraṇa
sādhaka nā pāya tāte kṛṣṇera caraṇa

synonyms: deha-tyāga—giving up the material body by suicide; ādi—beginning with; tamaḥ-dharma—on the platform of the mode of ignorance; pātaka-kāraṇa—cause of sinful activities; sādhaka—the devotee; nā pāya—does not get; tāte—by that; kṛṣṇera caraṇa—the lotus feet of Kṛṣṇa.
translation: "Measures like suicide are causes for sin. A devotee never achieves shelter at Kṛṣṇa's lotus feet by such actions.
